name: Valknut
description: An old school city building RTS where your people's greatest threat are the elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD FX-6300 with at least 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560/Radeon HD 6850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD FX-8350 with at least 2,5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 760/Radeon HD 6970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space
